title: Chipotle Rub
directions: Grind chipotle chiles in a spice mill; transfer to a small bowl. Grind peppercorns, coriander seeds, fennel seeds, and cumin seeds in the same spice mill; transfer to bowl with chiles. Stir in brown sugar, salt, and mustard powder.
ingredients: 1 1/2 dried chipotle chiles, stemmed, seeded, chopped
